SecDetPrior Module¶

sigvisa.priors.SecDetPrior.compute_coda_pairs(detections, leb_evlist)[source]¶
sigvisa.priors.SecDetPrior.compute_false_detections(detections, leb_evlist)[source]¶
sigvisa.priors.SecDetPrior.compute_secondary_dets(earthmodel, detections, leb_events, leb_evlist)[source]¶
sigvisa.priors.SecDetPrior.learn(param_fname, options, earthmodel, detections, leb_events, leb_evlist)[source]¶

The secondary detection model consists of multiple models which predict: - The probability of a secondary detection - The time delay of the secondary detection - The azimuth diff - The slowness diff - The log-amp diff - The secondary phase

sigvisa.priors.SecDetPrior.print_list(fp, list)[source]¶
